channel.title: Workshops on HKU Student Union
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops on HKU Student Union

item.title: 250624conversationCvB
item.description: The Union had a planned conversation with the CvB about the Union

item.title: Interview Alumnus about the Workshops
item.description: An interview with an alumnus of the HKU, that shares their story about how her usage of the workshops as an alumnus changed her career

item.title: Book of Worries session
item.description: A summary of the Session the Union hosted in Nieuwekade on June 17th, where they handed over the Book of Worries, written by the students

item.title: Workshops Session 17 June
item.description: On the 17th of June the Union hosted a session to write a book full of worries about the workshops. There were students and one alumnus that wanted to make their voices heard. After about an hour of writing and decorating the book, Judith of the CvB and Esther (Representative of the CvB) came to recieve the book personally, and we had a small conversation. On june 24 there was another conversation with representatives of the Union, that went a big deeper.

item.title: Update about removal of alumni workshop policy (long version)
item.description: Update about our work about the removal of the alumni workshop policy, with translated emails to english

item.title: Update about removal of alumni workshop policy (short version)
item.description: Short Summary of our email correspondence with the CvB and our petition

item.title: Meeting Notes June 5 2025
item.description: About the action to hand over our bundle of thoughts to the CvB and moving it to the 17th, a new edition of the newsletter and an ant end party at the end of the school year.

item.title: Statement about the new workshop policy
item.description: First Statement of the Union about the abolishement of the usage of the workshops for first-year alumni
